flagDescription: A skull with a serpent motif and red flowers
affiliations: World Government (through Boa Hancock's Shichibukai status)

keyMoments.title: Snake Princess's Return Anticipated
keyMoments.description: The Kuja warriors repeatedly mention that their captain, Boa Hancock (the Snake Princess), is returning to Amazon Lily on her ship with the Kuja Pirates crew.
keyMoments.significance: Builds anticipation for the crew's arrival and establishes their importance to the island's defense.

keyMoments.title: Revealed as Shichibukai Crew
keyMoments.description: Information is shared that the Kuja Pirates are led by a Shichibukai (Warlord of the Sea), making them officially sanctioned by the World Government despite being pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the crew's political power and protection from Marine assault.

reputation: Known as an all-female pirate crew led by one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea. Feared and respected for their combat prowess and use of Haki.
